page.title: 10WHY I MOVED TO THIS AREA
page.content:
by Andrew Johnston
We moved to this area because it was a bigger farm and dad wanted to keep more cows. Our previous farm near Bridport had only twenty acres and we only had thirty cows so we bought another twelve acres not far from the farm and every year we bought some grass keep. Our present farm is seventy acres large and we milk between 50-60 cows.And also we live by the road whereas at our other farm we lived down a stone track. Another thing I like up here is that there is a private road which goes to three other farms and we are allowed to ride our bikes down there. We need the road to get to most of our fields and we have to pay money to the council for the use of it.
